resources.string: Hello, you can use this application to check your skills on temrature conversation, or calculate the correct value.
Bravo! the temprature [%1$f] C is indeed [%2$f] F
Oops! your answer is wrong, you may want to try again.
The temprature [%1$f] F, is converted to [%2$f] C
The temprature [%1$f] C, is converted to [%2$f] F
